languages.text: "НЕТ!" {n}Ирлиэт склоняется над телом эльдара чтобы помочь, но глаза его широко открыты, а грудная клетка больше не вздымается от осторожных вдохов.{/n} "Он очнулся и вспомнил меня, элантах! И тут же погиб! Что за проклятие преследует детей Крудараха в этих стенах..."

traits.locale_text: "НЕТ!" {n}Ирлиэт склоняется над телом эльдара чтобы помочь, но глаза его широко открыты, а грудная клетка больше не вздымается от осторожных вдохов.{/n} "Он очнулся и вспомнил меня, элантах! И тут же погиб! Что за проклятие преследует детей Крудараха в этих стенах..."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "NO!" {n}Yrliet leans over the Aeldari's body to help, but his eyes are wide open and his chest no longer rises and falls from his cautious breath.{/n} "He was aware! He remembered me, elantach! And then, suddenly, he was dead! What kind of curse haunts Crudarach's children within these walls?"
languages.original_text: "НЕТ!" {n}Ирлиэт склоняется над телом эльдара чтобы помочь, но глаза его широко открыты, а грудная клетка больше не вздымается от осторожных вдохов.{/n} "Он очнулся и вспомнил меня, элантах! И тут же погиб! Что за проклятие преследует детей Крудараха в этих стенах..."

traits.locale_text: "NO!" {n}Yrliet leans over the Aeldari's body to help, but his eyes are wide open and his chest no longer rises and falls from his cautious breath.{/n} "He came to and remembered me, elantach! And then, at once, he was dead! What kind of curse is haunting Crudarach's children within these walls?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

And then, at once, he was dead! What kind of curse is haunting Crudarach's children within these walls?"

He remembered me, elantach! And then, suddenly, he was dead! What kind of curse haunts Crudarach's children within these walls?"

He remembered me, elantach! And then, suddenly, he was dead! What kind of curse haunts Crudarach's children within these walls?"

traits.locale_text: "NO!" {n}Yrliet leans over the Aeldari's body to help, but his eyes are wide open and his chest no longer rises and falls from his cautious breath.{/n} "He was aware! He remembered me, elantach! And then, suddenly, he was dead! What kind of curse haunts Crudarach's children within these walls?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¡NO!». {n}Yrliet se inclina sobre el cuerpo del Aeldari para ayudar, pero sus ojos están abiertos de par en par y su pecho ya no se mueve al respirar.{/n} «¡Estaba consciente! ¡Me recordaba, elantach! ¡Y de repente muere, así sin más! ¿Qué clase de maldición ha caído sobre los hijos de Crudarach entre estos muros?».
languages.original_text: "NO!" {n}Yrliet leans over the Aeldari's body to help, but his eyes are wide open and his chest no longer rises and falls from his cautious breath.{/n} "He was aware! He remembered me, elantach! And then, suddenly, he was dead! What kind of curse haunts Crudarach's children within these walls?"

traits.locale_text: «¡NO!». {n}Yrliet se inclina sobre el cuerpo del Aeldari para ayudar, pero sus ojos están abiertos de par en par y su pecho ya no se mueve al respirar.{/n} «¡Estaba consciente! ¡Me recordaba, elantach! ¡Y de repente muere, así sin más! ¿Qué clase de maldición ha caído sobre los hijos de Crudarach entre estos muros?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「いや！」{n}ユリエットはアエルダリの体を支えようと身を乗り出したが、彼の目は大きく見開かれ、かすかな呼吸で胸が上下することもなかった。{/n}「彼は分かっていた！エランタ、彼は我を覚えていたのだ！なのに突然、死んでしまうなんて！一体クルダラの子供たちは、ここでどんな呪いを受けているのだ？」
languages.original_text: "NO!" {n}Yrliet leans over the Aeldari's body to help, but his eyes are wide open and his chest no longer rises and falls from his cautious breath.{/n} "He was aware! He remembered me, elantach! And then, suddenly, he was dead! What kind of curse haunts Crudarach's children within these walls?"

traits.locale_text: 「いや！」{n}ユリエットはアエルダリの体を支えようと身を乗り出したが、彼の目は大きく見開かれ、かすかな呼吸で胸が上下することもなかった。{/n}「彼は分かっていた！エランタ、彼は我を覚えていたのだ！なのに突然、死んでしまうなんて！一体クルダラの子供たちは、ここでどんな呪いを受けているのだ？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “不！”{n}伊莉耶特靠在先知身上，试图把他救活，但先知的瞳孔已经放大，胸口微弱的起伏也消失了。{/n}“他刚刚清醒过来了！他还记得我，外界人！然后，他突然就死了！在这高墙之中，克鲁达拉赫的子嗣到底遭到了怎样的诅咒？”
languages.original_text: "NO!" {n}Yrliet leans over the Aeldari's body to help, but his eyes are wide open and his chest no longer rises and falls from his cautious breath.{/n} "He was aware! He remembered me, elantach! And then, suddenly, he was dead! What kind of curse haunts Crudarach's children within these walls?"

traits.locale_text: “不！”{n}伊莉耶特靠在先知身上，试图把他救活，但先知的瞳孔已经放大，胸口微弱的起伏也消失了。{/n}“他刚刚清醒过来了！他还记得我，外界人！然后，他突然就死了！在这高墙之中，克鲁达拉赫的子嗣到底遭到了怎样的诅咒？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « NON ! » {n}Yrliet se penche sur le corps de l'Aeldari pour l'aider, mais ses yeux sont grand ouverts et sa poitrine ne se soulève plus au rythme de son souffle.{/n} « Il était conscient ! Il se souvenait de moi, elantach ! Et d'un coup, il est mort ! Quelle est donc la malédiction qui pèse sur les enfants de Crudarach entre ces murs ? »
languages.original_text: "NO!" {n}Yrliet leans over the Aeldari's body to help, but his eyes are wide open and his chest no longer rises and falls from his cautious breath.{/n} "He was aware! He remembered me, elantach! And then, suddenly, he was dead! What kind of curse haunts Crudarach's children within these walls?"

traits.locale_text: « NON ! » {n}Yrliet se penche sur le corps de l'Aeldari pour l'aider, mais ses yeux sont grand ouverts et sa poitrine ne se soulève plus au rythme de son souffle.{/n} « Il était conscient ! Il se souvenait de moi, elantach ! Et d'un coup, il est mort ! Quelle est donc la malédiction qui pèse sur les enfants de Crudarach entre ces murs ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "NEIN!" {n}Yrliet beugt sich über den Aeldari, um ihm herauszuhelfen, aber seine Augen sind weit aufgerissen und sein Brustkorb bewegt sich nicht mehr.{/n} "Er war bei Bewusstsein! Er erinnerte sich an mich, Elantach! Und dann war er plötzlich tot! Was ist das hier für ein Fluch, der Crudarachs Kinder heimsucht?"
languages.original_text: "NO!" {n}Yrliet leans over the Aeldari's body to help, but his eyes are wide open and his chest no longer rises and falls from his cautious breath.{/n} "He was aware! He remembered me, elantach! And then, suddenly, he was dead! What kind of curse haunts Crudarach's children within these walls?"

traits.locale_text: "NEIN!" {n}Yrliet beugt sich über den Aeldari, um ihm herauszuhelfen, aber seine Augen sind weit aufgerissen und sein Brustkorb bewegt sich nicht mehr.{/n} "Er war bei Bewusstsein! Er erinnerte sich an mich, Elantach! Und dann war er plötzlich tot!" Was ist das hier für ein Fluch, der Crudarachs Kinder heimsucht?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "HAYIR!" {n}Yrliet, yardım etmek için Aeldari'nin üzerine eğiliyor. Ne yazık ki Aeldari'nin gözleri sonuna kadar açık, dikkatlice alı verdiği nefes ise artık göğsünü kaldırıp indirmiyor.{/n} "Bilinci yerindeydi! Beni hatırladı elantach! Sonra da... Bir anda öldü! Bu duvarlar arasında Crudarach'ın çocuklarına musallat olan bu lanet nasıl bir şey böyle?"
languages.original_text: "NO!" {n}Yrliet leans over the Aeldari's body to help, but his eyes are wide open and his chest no longer rises and falls from his cautious breath.{/n} "He was aware! He remembered me, elantach! And then, suddenly, he was dead! What kind of curse haunts Crudarach's children within these walls?"

traits.locale_text: "HAYIR!" {n}Yrliet, yardım etmek için Aeldari'nin üzerine eğiliyor ancak Aeldari'nin gözleri sonuna kadar açılmış hâlde. Göğsü ise dikkatlice alıp verdiği nefesiyle artık kalkıp inmiyor.{/n} "Bilinci yerindeydi! Beni hatırladı elantach! Sonra da... Bir anda öldü! Bu duvarların arasında Crudarach'ın çocuklarının peşini bırakmayan ne tür bir lanet var?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
